allow: Bash(if exist compose.yml move compose.yml compose.production.yml)
Bash(if exist docker-compose.dev.yml copy docker-compose.dev.yml compose.yml)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add balance back to uniqueCode to distinguish same-day same-amount payments

Same customer can make multiple payments of the same amount on the same day.
Without balance in uniqueCode, these legitimate payments were incorrectly
marked as duplicates and skipped.

Example: Customer 405135946 had 14 payments skipped because they had
the same date, amount, and customerId but different post-transaction balances.

Changes:
- UniqueCodeGenerator: Include balance in uniqueCode format
- PaymentRepository: Update reconstructUniqueCode to include balance
- DeduplicationService: Update to use full uniqueCode with balance

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
